name: Hand-crafted Rainbow Doll Blanket in Hand-dyed Pure Lambswool by Tafferty Designs
description:
This doll blanket has been hand-crafted with love...the love for dolls, the love for natural yarns and the love for pretty things. I used a gorgeous yarn that is a hand-dyed 100% lambswool that gives this unique one-of-a-kind rainbow effect. It is soft and it is warm, so it will keep your doll warm and cosy. I made it using a stitch that is hardly used these days. So trust me, you are unlikely to see many of these around. The tassels give it that bit of flare. The top edge has been left bare so that the tassels don’t get in your doll’s face. He or she might have a sneezing fit if they went up their nose! The yarn is a little fussy in that it prefers hand-washing. You only need to soak it for an hour or so in gentle detergent, rinse it and it will be nice and clean again. Never iron this and never tumble-dry it. It will get a bit grumpy and lose its shape. Now, we wouldn’t want that now, would we? 

SIZE:
This blanket measures 15” x 18” excluding the tassels, and will therefore be suitable for dolls from 10 inches tall all the way up to 18 inches tall. 

AVAILABILITY
This blanket will be made to order. Please allow 3-4 weeks for your blanket to me completed. 

Comes from a smoke-free, pet-free studio.

name: SMALL Blood Red Roses Flower Garden Tea Cosy - Pure Wool - Cream Base
description:
This is a lovely handknitted tea cosy in an ivory colour, decorated with crocheted deep red flowers and green leaves. The perfect gift for someone special or just for a special pot of tea any day. Great gift idea for the keen gardener, those into nature, those who love flowers and anyone who just likes pretty things! It makes a fantastic kitchen decoration as well as the perfect thing to keep your tea hot for longer. 

I make it using pure wool and is therefore nice and thick and will keep your tea hot for longer. The ribbed design is based on a vintage pattern but I have added my own personal touch of the arrangement of the flowers and leaves, which makes it very different from similar cosies on the market and therefore really unique.

Fits SMALL (1-2 cup) teapot. 

Comes from a clean, pet-free and smoke-free home. 

AVAILABILITY:
This tea cosy is made to order. Please allow 3-4 weeks for your order to be completed,then allow for shipping time. Thank you!

Tea and biscuits anyone?

name: Doll Aran Jumper with Crew neck Collar for 15 - 16 inch Waldorf Dolls in Green Alpaca Mix
description:
This is one of the latest doll sweater designs exclusive to Tafferty Designs. It’s hand-knitted using a yarn of beautiful quality that is a luxuriously soft mixture of alpaca and pure wool. The alpaca gives it the distinctive fuzzy texture and since the yarns are natural fibres, they are so soft and a lovely to the touch. The sweater features cables, which I am a huge fan of, bobbles and diamonds. There are wooden buttons at the back, so that you don't have to stretch the neck when dressing your doll. This will look great on both boy dolls and girl dolls! :-) I really love making these sweaters, and I think that this is the stuff doll dreams are made of! :-)

*NB: Due to the sweater having buttons, it is not intended for children under the age of three years*

SIZE:
This will fit most 15-16" dolls with measurements similar to those of Bamboletta dolls and Dragonflys Hollow Dolls (pictured). 

AVAILABILITY:
This sweater is ready to ship and will be shipped on the next working day.

Comes from a smoke-free, pet-free studio.

Want to keep in touch? Join me on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/taffertydesigns

name: Adorable Beige Tan Cashmerino Snugg Style Handknit Booties by Tafferty Designs - Made to Order
description:
These boots were made for wearing! These adorable, precious little boots inspired by the popular Ugg boots, are handknit and hand-finished especially for your precious bundle of joy. Made using a luxuriously soft blend of cashmere and merino in beige/tan, with a fluffy creamy trim, they will feel like a dream to wear, keeping your little one’s tootsies cosy and comfortable. They have a very roomy fit and wear well through the seasons. 

SIZES:
Available in sizes:
0-3 months
3-6 months
6-9 months. 
6-12 months

Please indicate size required in note to seller at PayPal checkout.

Custom orders welcome for different sizes and/or colours.

Comes from a clean, smoke-free, pet-free studio.

TURNAROUND TIME
This item will be made to order. Please allow 2-4 weeks for your order to be completed, then allow for shipping time. Thank you!

name: Adorable Baby Cashmerino Bunny Slippers
description:
Adorable hand-knitted baby Cashmerino bunny slippers/booties, with ties at the back to hold them in place so they don't slide off! They would be a wonderful gift for a special baby, which will be treasured as a keepsake long after baby has grown out of them! 

Made using Cashmerino, a luxuriously soft blend of cashmere and merino which makes them sooooooo comfy. You will want a pair too!

SIZES:
Available in sizes:
0-3 months
3-6 months
6-12 months

Make a note of the size you require at checkout. There is a message box on PayPal which you can use to send me a message. Alternatively, email me at taffertydesigns@hotmail.com

Custom orders welcome. You can have the ears in any colour that you like! 

Also available in other sizes and in sizes for dolls! (Check my other listings)

From smoke-free, pet-free home.

TURNAROUND TIME
This item will be made to order. Please allow 4 weeks for your order to be completed, then allow for shipping time. Thank you!
